alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Southeastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 6:45AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Snow Over The Eastern Interior This Weekend... Snow is expected to develop over the Eastern Interior late this afternoon and continue into Sunday. This will bring several inches of snow to much of the Eastern Interior, including Fairbanks, by Sunday. Areas of the Interior northeast of Northway, Ft Yukon and Coldfoot could get another 2-4 inches of snow Sunday night into Monday, while the remainder of the Eastern Interior will have little additional snow Sunday night and Monday. Areas along the Alaska Highway east of Dot Lake and through Alaska Range Passes could see northwest winds gusting to 25 mph along with blowing snow from late tonight into Sunday night.
